attributes.action: Abolish the monarch and give the money we pay to the NHS and other services
attributes.additional_details: We could achieve a lot more with a republic and our military could be stronger with more budgets so could the NHS.
attributes.background: Us tax payers pay 35 Million pounds to the royal family to live in luxury and comfort and pay for their security. This money could go towards the NHS, Cancer research, coronavirus research etc. The Monarch hasn't gained power by working for ut instead he/she has been born into it.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you want to abolish the Monarchy, but the funding for the Monarchy is a proportion of the soveriegn's income from the Crown Estate. You can find out more here:

https://www.royal.uk/royal-finances-0

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to increase funding of the NHS or other services.  
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.  If you decide to start a new petition you'll need to include your full name.
